turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a pizza from Antonio's, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, happy to help. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A chicken pesto pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great. Would you like to place an order for delivery or pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can come pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great. Can I help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get it with a gluten free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, this location doesn't have gluten free crust available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, that's too bad. Can I add olives to the pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, that's not a problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, to confirm, you'd like to order a large chicken pesto pizza with olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I've placed the order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is my total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total comes to $22.50.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

items.name: I've placed the order for you
